title: Steve Reeves | Hercules (1958) Adventure Fantasy Movie | Directed by Pietro Francisci

sources.title: Steve Reeves | Hercules (1958) Adventure Fantasy Movie | Directed by Pietro Francisci
sources.description:
The muscular Hercules performs his Labors, sails with the Argonauts, and romances the fair Iole.
In this melange of characters and events from separate mythological stories, Hercules, demigod and super-human, arrives in the ancient Greek kingdom of Iolcus to tutor Iphitus, son of king Pelias; immediately on arrival, he falls in love with the kingâ€™s delectable, briefly clad daughter Iole. Before he can win her, he must succeed in a series of quests, in the course of which he teams up with Jason, true heir of Iolcus, whom he accompanies on the famous voyage of the Argonauts. 

Original title: Le fatiche di Ercole (1959) 

Director: Pietro Francisci
Writers: Apollonios Rhodios, Pietro Francisci, Ennio De Concini
Stars: Steve Reeves, Sylva Koscina, Fabrizio Mioni
Genres: Adventure, Fantasy, History, Peplum
Budget: $2,000,000
